trans-unit.source: Exposes the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: Se patternInterface è , questo metodo restituisce l'istanza corrente di questo .

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
